p: Finally, implementing the less optimistic intervention package would avert 57% (n = 40 to 3906 at country‐level) and 43% (n = 6 to 978) of incident infections per year among PWID and their sexual partners respectively, while the more optimistic scenario would avert 93% (n = 73 to 6272) and 71% (n = 13 to 1576) of these infections respectively (Table 3, Figure 3).
